channel.title: Confidence Calibration on The Approximate Mind
channel.description: Recent content in Confidence Calibration on The Approximate Mind

item.title: The Approximate Mind, Part 1: How AI Is Getting Closer to Understanding
item.description: Can machines understand? Not in some distant future, but now. Not perfectly, but approximately. Not by achieving consciousness, but by approximating the functional patterns of human understanding well enough to matter.
